review: After a total of 4 hours and 2-3 phone calls to each Comcast and Amazon, could never get it connected to Comcast.
author: Teri Krause "Teri"

review: It's handy, but unless you have a prime membership or a cable provider there is not a lot on there for free. Also the remote either stops working or the buttons stick and doesn't stop moving on way or the other.
author: nutiket02

review: It is quick to setup, but it keeps freezing to load, complain about Wi-Fi too slow. My Chromcast does not have this issue. So I do not know what is up... But the kids are having a blast watching all the kids shows.
author: Nabih A.

review: I already had the fire box. But the fire stick is so much easier to carry and use wherever you go.
author: tommie sanchez

review: Love everything about the Fire TV stick, much better reception than I had on my smart TV alone!
author: DiW "Bookworm"

review: I couldn't make the decision between the Chromecast and the Fire Stick so I bought both. i like both, but I think most people will like the UI built into the Fire Stick. It is very intuitive. Product is a hands down winner if you are a Prime customer.
author: Michael Melendrez

review: Love it more than my apple TV
author: Paul Moon
